description:
This signal detects events that may indicate the use of FTP network connections.
The File Transfer Protocol (FTP) has been around in its current form since the
1980's. It can be an efficient and normal procedure on your network to send and
receive files. Because it is common and efficient, adversaries will also often
use this protocol to exfiltrate data from your network or download new tools.
Additionally, FTP is a plaintext protocol which may expose your username and
password, if intercepted.
name: FTP (File Transfer Protocol) Activity to the Internet
